Title: Around the World in 80 Days
Writer: Jules Verne (novel), David N. Titcher (screenplay), David Benullo (screenplay), David Andrew Goldstein (screenplay)
Actors: Jackie Chan, Steve Coogan, Cécile de France, Robert Fyfe
Plot: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly eighty days.
Language: English, Cantonese, French, German, Hindi, Turkish
